title: President Donald J. Trump Is Honoring the Sacrifices of Our Nation’s Veterans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
November 15, 2018
I am steadfastly committed to ensuring our veterans and their families receive the care and support they deserve.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROVIDING QUALITY HEALTHCARE FOR OUR VETERANS: President Donald J. Trump continues to work every day to improve healthcare and expand services for our Nation’s veterans.BRINGING ACCOUNTABILITY TO THE VA: The Trump Administration is strengthening accountability and transparency at the VA. SUPPORTING AMERICA’S FINEST: President Trump is committed to supporting America’s veterans by improving access to education benefits, housing, and employment.
